description: Consolidate fragmented files on local volumes.

priority.description: Run the operation at low or normal priority.

excluded_volumes.description: A list of drive letters or mount point paths to exclude from defragmentation.

included_volumes.description: A list of drive letters or mount point paths of the volumes to be defragmented. If this parameter is omitted, all volumes (not excluded) will be fragmented.

freespace_consolidation.description: Perform free space consolidation on the specified volumes.

parallel.description: Run the operation on each volume in parallel in the background.
